comments.body: You probably just need python and pip in host

@scopatz I got the building errors in **linux_64**, **osx_64**, and **win_64** after removing them from 'host':

```
2020-10-05T20:48:29.8077779Z     ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'pandas'
2020-10-05T20:48:29.8418496Z ERROR: Command errored out with exit status 1: python setup.py egg_info Check the logs for full command output.
.
.
.
2020-10-05T20:48:39.6337782Z ##[error]Bash exited with code '1'.
2020-10-05T20:48:39.6356149Z ##[section]Finishing: Run docker build
```
